white: The secret way into the city.
The creation of a new species just for kicks.
The elegant raise of an eyebrow.
Bringing a harp on a rescue mission.
The last survivors of a murderous family.
Middle children who no one really likes.
The secret passageway everyone seems to know about.
Walking straight into the enemy camp and walking back out again.
Forcing people to die for your daughter's hand.
Threatening siblings with decapitation in public.
An improbable number of human skeletons.
Reasons that made sense at the time.
People who will kill you for a ride.
Rewriting history to make your foster-father look good.
The clammy stench of unwashed terror.
A shackle bolted to a cliff.
The pretty stranger with his pockets full of presents.
The deepest, darkest part of the cavern.
The spiritual significance of hair colors.
The flimsy box containing the plunder.
Achieving your life goals and realizing they sucked.
Shattered ankles and a seriously cramped world domination plan.
Jewelry which is more important than children.
Glowing blue in the presence of orcs.
Two tent cities staring at each other across a lake.
Writing a song about your own worst mistake.
Three of my brothers at once.
Convenient failure to mention anyone's mother.
Washing your hair in the sacred pool.
Pirates sailing the wrong way down the river.
A tidal wave sent by the wrath of the ocean god.
A dog that prevents his owner from assaulting women.
An entire people descended from three brothers.
Surviving to the end of the book.
A dark elf with a martyr complex.
Malt beer and fresh meat off the bone.
A creature of flame and shadow.
A lonely man chained to a cliff.
Getting tucked in at night by your parents' murderer.
Becoming a single parent in the most traumatic manner possible.
Rulers who disappear at inconvenient moments.
The skulls of your enemies and some of your friends.
Complicated reasons to flip off a deity.
Challenging the source of evil to single combat.
Short people singing annoying songs about your relatives.
Founding an island nation which will inevitably turn to evil.
Being locked up in a treehouse.
Sailing a shiny ship through the skies.
An indefinite time-out in the void.
That moment when you realize there's only one twin.
Wandering in pain and regret by the ocean.
The woman who drives the sun.
Being eaten one at a time.
A reeking pile of the slain.
Treading on the skulls of your erstwhile allies.
The werewolves that ate all your friends.
The mighty blade that caused the epitome of evil to limp slightly.
Killing spiders with a letter opener.
Random encounters with relatives you've never met.
The greatest werewolf that ever lived.
Being a divine messenger whose message is totally ignored.
Flowers growing on the tombs of one's forebears.
Coming home to find your house being sold.
Never leaving this dark forest again.
Accidentally drinking from a divination device.
Blended families that don't quite blend right.
The older of a pair of twins.
The lamentations of the enemy's women.
A man with seven sons and no fucks to give.
Watching your brother's eyes be stabbed out with a fork.
Bouncing three times on the rocks before pitching into the flames.
